events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the software engineer position at our company.
John Doe's application has been categorized under the engineering department based on his experience and resume details.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's application process for the engineering role.
Initial screening call was conducted with John Doe to assess his technical skills and fit for the software engineer position.
John Doe responded positively, expressing enthusiasm about the opportunity and confirming availability for the next steps.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for John Doe on May 5th at 10 AM.
John Doe completed the technical interview with excellent performance and demonstrated strong coding abilities.
Following the technical round, John Doeâ€™s HR interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 3 PM.
John Doe successfully completed the HR interview, answering questions about company culture and benefits.
An offer letter has been proposed to John Doe including salary details, start date, and other benefits.
We received positive feedback from John Doe confirming he is reviewing the offer and asking a few clarifying questions.
John Doe has accepted the offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team at our company.
John Doe has started the onboarding process with HR and the engineering department.
The hiring process for John Doe is now complete and he is officially a new member of the engineering team.
